#summary This page describe how to use Html field
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Html Field =

== Description ==

This field provides a full html wysiwog (What You See Is What You Got) editor to insert into form.

== External resources ==

The Html Field uses [http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/ TinyMCE] javascript library to build the html editor.

== Attributes ==

|| *Attribute* || *Description* || *Example* ||
|| options || One associative array containing the parameters to initialize the !TinyMCE editor, check the [http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Configuration configuration documentation] at [http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/ TinyMCE website] to get a complete list of avaliable options || _see below_ ||

== Example ==

{{{
curriculum:
        type: Html
        label: Curriculum
        params:
            options:
                plugins: fullscreen,paste
                theme: advanced
                theme_advanced_toolbar_location: top
                theme_advanced_toolbar_align: left
                theme_advanced_buttons1_add: |,forecolor,fullscreen
                theme_advanced_buttons3: ''
}}}
